Ashe.value: On average, you are about 30m away from your taget, giving you somewhere between a 10-20% weapon power bonus. 17% is a fair estimate.
You gain 10% weapon power when above. With the base 5%, estimate 8% gain, a total of 13% WP.

Item itself provides 15AP. Since dynamite and power-based effect also triggers burning, while themself don't trigger burning damage bonus, we estimate +10AP and +5WP that benefits from burning damage bonus.
Only life steal from burning damage, so estimate 5% ALS is missing from Bob and coach gun
AP can stack up to 25%, estimate having 15% AP up time.

attributes.value: Even if enemy has no bonus attack speed, you still gain the 10% attack speed from the item itself if you damage.

Ashe.value: Gain 5% Weapon Power for each enemy with a [Wound] within 12m.
Instead of 15WP, You almost always have 5% more WP from this item.
While within 12m of an enemy with a [Wound], gain 5% Move Speed and 10% Attack Speed.
Instead of 5% MS, You almost always have 5% more MS and 10AS from this item.

attributes.value: Best value item for Juno/Mercy. Use avoid item if not applicable. (Weapon dealing damage to airborne enemies deal 25% bonus damage over 3s.)

Ashe.value: When you [Wound an enemy, gain 10% Attack Speed for 4s, stacking up to 3 times.
You almost always have 1 stacks of 10% AS from this item.
